TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111535=Copyright © 2011, 11873=Assume that Mr. Naveed decided to start a "shoes business" of his own, to be known as Naveed Shoes Company". textAfterTable: It may be noted that equality of the two sides was maintained throughout the recording of the transactions.   More study material from this topic: Definition and explanation of a business transaction Features of transaction Classification of transactions Cash and credit transactions Accounting equation with an example Questions and answers
